original_text: And the anointing oil, and sweet incense for the holy place: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they do.
korean_text: 관유와 성소의 향기로운 향이라 무릇 내가 네게 명령한 대로 그들이 만들지니라

sentences.original_text: and sweet incense for the holy place:
according to all that I have commanded thee
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 명령한 모든 것에 따라
